text: Crime & Investigation (stylized as Crime + Investigation) is an American pay television channel. It is owned by A&E; Networks. That company is owned by Hearst Communications and the Disney Entertainment division of The Walt Disney Company. The channel broadcasts worldwide. The network broadcasts mostly reruns of crime dramas made by other networks. These include 24, Nash Bridges and Hack. They also broadcast the A&E; crime documentary programs SWAT, Uncovered, The First 48, American Justice, The Big House and Vanished With Beth Holloway. ==References== Category:American television networks Category:The Walt Disney Company
title: Crime & Investigation
